definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
United Kingdom/British/England/English/abbr. for 英國|英国[Ying1 guo2]
clock/o'clock/time as measured in hours and minutes/bell/CL:架[jia4],座[zuo4]
handleless cup/goblet/to concentrate/variant of 鐘|钟[zhong1]

sentences.english: Your quartz clocks are quite salable on our market.
sentences.chinese: 你们的石英钟在市场上卖得不错。

sentences.english: Our company is the one producing "Guiguan" brand series quartz clock.
sentences.chinese: 本公司是以生产“桂冠”牌系列石英钟的企业。

sentences.english: The time on the quartz watch at my home is several minutes earlier than that on the television.
sentences.chinese: 我家石英钟的时间比电视上显示的时间快几分钟。

sentences.english: 211Please send us your price list of quartz clocks。
sentences.chinese: 请寄给我们贵方的石英钟价目单。

sentences.english: The clock is now controlled by a high grade quartz clock in the main entrance of the Observatory.
sentences.chinese: 此钟现由位于天文馆主入口处的高频石英钟控制。

sentences.english: I saw a beautiful clock last time I was shopping and I wanted to get it for her.
sentences.chinese: 我上次逛街时看见一个石英钟挺漂亮的，想送给她。

sentences.english: The time base was given both by a crystal clock and the broadcast standard signals.
sentences.chinese: 时间标准是由石英钟和广播标准信号提供的。

sentences.english: There is a gold quartz clock near the wood shutter.
sentences.chinese: 木制的百叶窗旁挂着一个金黄色的石英钟。

sentences.english: Quartz-crystal technology did not remain the premier frequency standard for long either, however.
sentences.chinese: 不过石英钟技术称霸计时标准的寿命也不长。

sentences.english: It analyses it's characteristics and also directs and summarizes such designing of quartz crystal clock movement.
sentences.chinese: 该方法对此类型石英钟机心的设计具有一定参考价值。

sentences.english: Please send us your price list of quartz clocks.
sentences.chinese: 请寄给我们贵方的石英钟价目单。

sentences.english: Hearing the striking of the clock on the wall, I knew it was already one past midnight.
sentences.chinese: 听到墙上的石英钟的报时，我知道已经一点了。

sentences.english: I saw a beautiful clock last time I was shopping.
sentences.chinese: 我上次逛街时看见一个石英钟挺漂亮的。

sentences.english: This kind of set fit onvariouis second juniper quartz movement.
sentences.chinese: 这种报时装置适合于各种秒跳式石英钟机心。

definition: variant of 表盤|表盘[biao3 pan2]/watch face
pointer on a gauge/clock hand/cursor/(computing) pointer
